headline: Should Grasberg Safety Lawsuits and Disclosure Claims Require Action From Freeport-McMoRan (FCX) Investors?
summary: In recent days, multiple law firms have filed securities class action lawsuits accusing Freeport-McMoRan of misrepresenting safety conditions at its Grasberg Block Cave mine in Indonesia, following a fatal landslide and subsequent operational disruptions. The wave of litigation highlights how mine safety practices and disclosure quality can directly affect Freeport-McMoRan’s regulatory exposure, operational continuity, and relationship with the Indonesian government. Next, we’ll examine how...

headline: Freeport-McMoRan (FCX): A Fresh Look at Valuation After This Month’s Copper-Fueled Share Price Rise
summary: Freeport-McMoRan (FCX) has quietly ground out steady gains this month, with the stock up about 13% and roughly 19% year to date, as copper prices and demand expectations continue to drive sentiment. See our latest analysis for Freeport-McMoRan. That latest move builds on a solid trend, with Freeport-McMoRan’s 30 day share price return of about 13% and five year total shareholder return of just over 100% suggesting momentum is still very much intact. If copper’s strength has you thinking about...

headline: Why is Freeport-McMoRan Inc (FCX) One of the Best Copper Stocks to Buy Right Now?
summary: Freeport-McMoRan Inc (NYSE:FCX) is one of the best copper stocks to buy right now. JPMorgan lifted the price target on Freeport-McMoRan Inc (NYSE:FCX) to $58 from $50 while keeping an Overweight rating on the stock, adjusting price targets on the North America metals and mining group as part of its 2026 outlook. Similarly, Deutsche Bank […]
